nodes.text: Genesis Red was the male crime lord leader of the eponymous criminal organization. He participated in the gang's occupation of portions of the lower levels of Tansarii Point Station in 1 ABY, but their plans were thwarted when a large number of their thugs and officers were killed by hired Spacers and agents of the Tansarii Point Station authorities. He was amongst those killed by the hired spacers.

Genesis Red first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011, as an enemy on the games tutorial level on Tansarii point station, added by the NGE update. He could be killed by the player as part of a side quest given by Rydel Delan. Genesis Red has no canon species as they respawned with a random appearance each time they were killed. While he could also respawn as a female, Rydel Delan stated he was male.
